title: Average attendance in the National Football League 2019
summary: Overall Average attendance has decreased over the Year.
Average attendance is roughly increasing from 2009 to 2010, roughly constant from 2010 to 2015, slightly increasing from 2015 to 2016, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2016 to 2017.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2016 and 2017.
The highest Average attendance, of value 69487.0 was reached at Year 2016
Minimum Average attendance about 66957.0 was reached at Year 2010
min_summary: In general Average attendance has stayed the same over the Year.
Average attendance is roughly increasing from 2009 to 2010, roughly constant from 2010 to 2015, slightly increasing from 2015 to 2016, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2016 to 2017.
